FuncDef: This command specifies the VLAN-ID to be used for Ethernet CFM and G.8031 control plane exchanges. If the operator wants to replace an existing control-tag, the parent path needs to be in shutdown state, then deleted and recreated before a new control-tag can be specified.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the value of the VLAN ID to be used for the control tag. Values-1 to 4094, untagged option is not supported, *.
